scripts.mini: minify css/global.css > css/global.min.css && minify css/loader.css > css/loader.min.css && minify css/tags.css > css/tags.min.css && terser --compress --mangle -- js/app.js > js/app.min.js && terser --compress --mangle -- js/blogWorker.js > js/blogWorker.min.js
scripts.img: squoosh-cli --webp '{quality:75}' --resize '{width: 220, height: 220}' -d img img/coffeeecream.png && squoosh-cli --webp '{quality:75}' --resize '{width: 220, height: 220}' -d img img/scratch.png && squoosh-cli --oxipng '{quality:50}' -d img img/disc.jfif
